info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:06PM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR PORTER AND CENTRAL LAKE COUNTIES... At 905 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burns Harbor to near Valparaiso to near Hebron, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Valparaiso and Chesterton around 910 PM CDT. Kouts, Town of Pines and Beverly Shores around 915 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Malden, Dune Acres, Wheeler and Boone Grove. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Illinois...and northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
